channel.title: Java programming?
channel.description:
Hi! I really wanna set myself into coding sources and clients and such ;)
I just want to know where u guys learn to code for rsps??? From schools or at the net? If net, then plz post a link or something :P All help is appreciated :D

item.title: Java programming?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Davidi2:

He wants to add customs, not actually learn to program.

There’s the number one problem :\

Read full topic

item.title: Java programming?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:13, topic:342427”][quote author=14harry14 link=topic=438837.msg3225127#msg3225127 date=1275511205]

[quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=438837.msg3224990#msg3224990 date=1275500992]

[quote author=Adam link=topic=438837.msg3224988#msg3224988 date=1275500950]

where u guys learn to code for rsps???

You’re on the forum that teaches how…
[/quote]wrong side buddy
[/quote]I cant find where?!? I look at the server tuts, but it almost only teaches me how to make a server online or something like that… I wanna know how to add customs, add objects, shops, NPC’s and such… All that coding stuff… Post a link so i know where to look ;D
[/quote][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=438837.msg3231305#msg3231305 date=1276097341]
Run through all of these:

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/getStarted/index.html
[/quote]He wants to add customs, not actually learn to program.[/quote]

It doesn’t matter what he wants to do with Java, he needs to start there.

Read full topic

item.title: Java programming?
item.dc:creator: @LegionOfDoom LegionOfDoom
item.description:
@LegionOfDoom wrote:

SilentCJ:

Download a server and see what things do when you change them, that’s how I learnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Java programming?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Setting up Java and the works in order to begin.

How to Start a Server tutorial to know where to begin

Tutorial Section to learn something new

Tutorials List; A complete list of all of the current tutorials

Server Help Section for all of your questions about private servers

That’s all you need to start on private servers.

Read full topic
